page.title: 02MANOR FARM, ODCOMBE
page.content: In our village we have several farms, one of which is called Manor Farm. Sarah Lloyd and Jenny Francis have surveyed the farm.They were told that the farm had{196 cows,}and{96 acres which was mostly{grazing.}The older buildings are made from the local yellow-brown sandstone,but several of the newer, bigger outbuildings are of wood and corrugated iron sheeting. Although the farm is on one of the main streets of the village cows or farm vehicles are not often out on the roads as there is easy access to the fields. Some of the farm lanes are also used by the public for walking but the one past Manor Farm was so overgrown this summer that no-one could use it.
